Cédric Beust ♔ schrieb:
> I think the difficulty here comes from the fact that in JUnit, test classes
> and test suites are hard to tell apart.  If you look at a class, it's a
> "test suite" if has a suite() method and a "test class" otherwise.
I'm not sure about JUnit 4, but in JUnit 3, a "test class" *was* an 
implicite "test suite".

Cheers, Ilja
